card.name: Machamp-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Steaming Mad
attacks.text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of damage counters on this Pokémon. This Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Crazy Hammer
attacks.text: If this Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 80 more damage. Then, remove all Special Conditions from this Pokémon.
